Item.Name: Double Jump
Item.Description: Allows you to jump in the air. Reach heights you've never dared!

Item.Name: Slow Time
Item.Description: Can't keep the pace? Don't panic! Slow Time will give you a break

Item.Name: Force Blaster
Item.Description: Unleash a killing shockwave to get rid of nearby hunter

Item.Name: Checkpoint
Item.Description: When you're tired of rerunning same roof over and over again - just save wherever you want.
